workflow.name: Metabarcoding OTU Clustering - Illumina PE
workflow.workflow-desc: OTU clustering pipeline for Illumina metabarcoding paired-end reads

workflow.name: Metabarcoding Denoising - Illumina PE
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for denoising of Illumina metabarcoding paired-end reads.

workflow.name: Metabarcoding Denoising - PacBio CCS
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for denoising of PacBio CCS reads.

workflow.name: Shotgun Metagenomics - Eukaryotes
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for QC, assembly, and binning of the eukaryotic fraction of a shotgun metagenomic Illumina paired-end data.

workflow.name: Shotgun Metagenomics - Virus
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for QC, assembly, and binning of the viral fraction of a shotgun metagenomic Illumina paired-end data.

workflow.name: Shotgun Metagenomics - Virus 2
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for hybrid assembly and recovery of viral metagenome-assembled genomes using long read library(ies) (i.e. PacBio / Nanopore) and Illumina PE data.

workflow.name: Genomics - Prokaryotes
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for QC, assembly, and functional annotation of prokaryotic genomic Illumina paired-end data.

workflow.name: PICRUSt2
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for prediction of community functional profile from 16S metabarcoding sequence data.

workflow.name: Phylogenetic Placement
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for placement of short sequencing reads into a reference phylogenetic tree.

workflow.name: RNA-seq
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for RNA-seq Illumina paired-end data. Includes: QC, assembly, mapping, estimation of transcript abundance, functional annotation, and differential expression analysis.
